welcome: Hello! I am your bot. Use the menu for navigation:

city.unknown: Sorry, I don't know this city. Please select a city from the list.

photo.request: Send me a photo and I will process it!
photo.received: You sent a photo! File ID: ${fileId}

greeting: Hello, ${name}! How can I help you today?
say_hello: Nice to meet you! I'm your helpful bot.

navigation.history_empty: Cannot go back. Navigation history is empty.
navigation.back_success: You have returned to the previous step.
navigation.back_error: Could not go back. Please try again.
navigation.back_option: Use Back button to return to previous menu

settings.title: User Settings
settings.need_city_first: You need to select a city before choosing a branch.

order.history_empty: You don't have any orders yet. Make your first order!

aksiya.no_active: There are no active promotions at the moment. Stay tuned for updates!

join_team.info: Want to become part of the Les Ailes team? Send your resume to email: careers@lesailes.uz or call: +998 71 123-45-67

contact.info: Les Ailes Contact Information: Phone: +998 71 123-45-67 Email: info@lesailes.uz Website: www.lesailes.uz We are open daily from 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM.

self_pickup.select_option: Where to deliver? Send your location and we determine the nearest branch and delivery cost.
self_pickup.location_request: Please send your location to determine the nearest branch

branch_info.make_order: Click "Make Order" button to place an order

error.city_selection: An error occurred while selecting the city. Please try again.
error.language_selection: An error occurred while selecting the language. Please try again.
error.i18n_not_initialized: An error occurred while initializing translations. Please try again later.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
error.branches_load_failed: Sorry, we couldn't load the list of branches. Please try again later.
error.branch_not_found: Sorry, we couldn't find information about the selected branch. Please try again.
error.branch_location_failed: Sorry, we couldn't get the branch coordinates.
